entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:42 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 06:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: WSW 31 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 early this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
